scripts.prep: rm -rf dist/nodejs/*; cp package.json dist/nodejs/; cd dist/nodejs; yarn --production; cd ..; zip -r /tmp/hummus-lambda-layer.zip nodejs
scripts.publish-layer: aws lambda publish-layer-version --layer-name "hummus-lambda-layer" --description "NodeJS module of Hummus library" --license-info "MIT" --compatible-runtimes "nodejs8.10" --zip-file "fileb:////tmp/hummus-lambda-layer.zip"
